item.title: Kubernetes
item.author: thqnhat@outlook.com (Nhat Tong)
item.description: 1. Provision CA Certificate Authority { cat > ca-config.json << EOF { "signing": { "default": { "expiry": "8760h" }, "profiles": { "kubernetes": { "usages": ["signing", "key encipherment", "server auth", "client auth"], "expiry": "8760h" } } } } EOF cat > ca-csr.json << EOF { "CN": "Kubernetes", "key": { "algo": "rsa", "size": 2048 }, "names": [ { "C": "FR", "L": "Paris", "O": "Kubernetes", "OU": "CA", "ST": "IDF" } ] } EOF cfssl gencert -initca ca-csr.
